a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of electricity production from renewable sources, 1990
Percentage of electricity produced through renewable sources. This includes biomass, hydropower, solar, wind, geothermal and
marine energy. Electricity produced by nuclear sources is not included.
Data source: World Bank, Sustainable Energy for All (SE4ALL)
